How do I show and install updates from c: sudo apt-get update then "sudo apt-get upgrade" or "sudo aptitude safe-upgrade"
apt-get upgrade will NOT install new packages, aptitude safe does
the lock says you  can't write to it (i believe)
in a terminal, "sudo chown YOURUSERNAME:YOURUSENAME FolderName"

you probably don't!  but from a terminal run "apt-cache search rootkit" and see some root kit scan tools in the default install.  best of luck.  it's highly unlikely you would get something remotely (but not impossible)
